needs: Seeking a part‑time (20h/wk) HR Generalist role supporting a People Director to deliver measurable outcomes within 90 days—reduce disputes and time‑to‑hire, cut waste, and strengthen compliance and benefits governance. Operates under limited hours and budgetary accountability, favoring rapid probes, instrumentation, SLOs, and pragmatic process redesign.
personality: Direct, transparent, and data‑driven communicator who surfaces unknowns early through probes and small experiments. Values inclusion, humane processes, and readable documentation. Prefers small, observable increments, clear SLOs and decision logs, hands‑on collaboration across functions, and mentoring through pairing and concise narrative updates to keep momentum visible.
